title: Just realized a question I posted before haven't got a final answer yet, have to post it again

embed.description: So this just happened. It's not just that I didn't request this. I noticed this e-mail's format is different from what I would receive when I manually change my password http://i.imgur.com/8plTNCH.png , which means it's probably not someone else messing with my account, but Riot

body:
I'll try to make myself clear:
This "temporary password" thing is impossible for a player to do as far as I know, so I believe it's a riot decision.
I **need **to know why Riot did this , because if you randomly do the same thing to my other accounts, I won't be able to receive those emails and straight out lose those accounts.

replies.body:
No worries, those two e-mail are both from us! I dug through your old tickets, and it looks like someone was able to verify themselves and request a password reset. If you don't remember doing this, I'd highly suggest opening another ticket with our account agents to make sure your account is protected.

This reset was submitted from someones request, not a random thing Riot sent out.
